name: BUNKER PROTECTION
description:
You are one of the newest soldiers sent on a mission to save humanity. In the future, humanity is struck by a terrible and rapidly spreading disease that turns people into zombies. Scientists invented a serum against the virus, but did not have time to spray it before they were destroyed by the zombie invasion.

You are sent to a dangerous bunker, where the last hope of humanity is located - a serum against the virus. Your main goal is to do everything possible to extract the serum and bring it to the surface to save the survivors from the terrible fate of the zombies.

The game is a 2D platformer. You need to destroy enemies and go through stage by stage.

Can you overcome all the obstacles, find the serum and return to the surface to save the world from complete destruction?
